data.title: Larramie Doc Shaw
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of Larramie Doc Shaw on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text: Larramie "Doc" Shaw became an actor when he was just 14 years old. "Doc" Shaw began his acting career with roles in sitcoms like "Tyler Perry's House of Payne" (TBS, 2006-2012) and "Pair of Kings" (Disney XD, 2010-12). He also appeared in the TV special "Return of the Kings" (Disney XD, 2010-11). He also appeared in the Kevin Durant comedy "Thunderstruck" (2012). during these years "Doc" Shaw most recently acted in the Andy Serkis smash hit action picture "Dawn of the Planet of the Apes" (2014).
